ygData.subject: Save single domain to single WARC file
ygData.msgSnippet: Hi, Is it possible to save every single domain to single warc file. I mean for example, I have 100 domain seeds, every domain will be saved in single warc

Hi, 
Is it possible to save every single domain to single warc file.
I mean=
 for example, I have 100 domain seeds, every domain will be saved in single=
 warc file, so in the end of crawling I'll have 100 warc files as output?
T=
hank you, Ilia.
